channel.title: Help with a clicking buttons case

item.title: Help with a clicking buttons case
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

Here is my case 9194:

[code] case 9194:
if (c.teleAction == 1) {
//island
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3117, 9847, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
//last minigame spot
c.getPA().spellTeleport(2865,3546,0);
//c.getPA().closeAllWindows();
} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
c.dialogueId = 333;
c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0);
c.dialogueAction = -1;
} else if (c.teleAction == 4) {
c.dialogueId = 50;
c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
c.getPA().spellTeleport(2812,3463,0);
}
if (c.dialogueAction == 10 || c.dialogueAction == 11) {
c.dialogueId++;
c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0);
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
c.dialogueId = 17;
c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0);
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 77) {
c.dialogueId = 334;
c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0);

			} else if (c.teleAction == 20) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3506,3496,0);
			}
			break;[/code]

Now thereâ€™s 2 parts of that case that wont seem to work.

} else if (c.teleAction == 3) { c.dialogueId = 333; c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0); c.dialogueAction = -1;

Thats near the top, and that option is for more boss teleports.

Heres another coder, for even more boss teleports.

} else if (c.dialogueAction == 77) { c.dialogueId = 334; c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0);

This one is near the bottom of case 9194. But this one, wont show more teleports when you click it. What happened here?

Read full topic
item.source: Help with a clicking buttons case
